group_1.narration: Chinese Restaurant Banbanzai@Rating: ★★★☆☆@The 100th review in a series@of popular reviews...
This is Banbanzai in Sankyo!@The interior of the restaurant has an@old-fashioned feel, but it's not uncomfortable!@This time I ordered soy sauce ramen and fried rice,@which tastes...
It's like...@Warm sunshine in spring! Yeah!@The taste is so comforting that@you can't help but smile, and it@makes you feel warm from the@bottom of your stomach!

The atmosphere of the restaurant is so good that@I feel like becoming a regular 365 days a year!@I would have given it a 2.5 star rating, but@considering the atmosphere and@the personality of the father...

group_1.textLeft: Whew...done!@Now I'll post it...done!

group_1.textRight: Eating every day, keeping track...@You never get bored.

group_1.textLeft: Ohh, Kyubey, you're here!
You're the one who's never bored,@soliciting people every day.
I told you when we first met, didn't I?
You'll grant me a wish?@[chara:302401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:302401:cheek_0][chara:302401:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302401:lipSynch_1]Mm, not right now.
What I'm doing now is fine.
I feel like if I don't do it on my own,@then what's the point!
I won't change my mind for the time being!

group_1.textRight: Unfortunately, it looks like I'll have to@give up.

group_1.textLeft: Yup, yup! I'll call you if I change my mind!
Okay, I'm going to bed now!

group_1.textRight: ...Come to think of it, you're not@eating dinner today.

group_1.textLeft: I'm going to Walnut's tomorrow,@so I need to be as hungry as possible!
I've gotten better at reviewing,@and I've gained more followers.
I'm going to prove that I'm useful!

group_1.narration: At first glance,@it looks like an ordinary rice omelet,@but you can tell that it's a dish that@has been meticulously prepared...!

Upon putting it in your mouth, you'll be@greeted with the aroma of butter in your nose,@followed by the flavor of egg and tomato...@The light and fluffy eggs soften the sourness@of the chicken rice, and each bite brings@a different flavor to your mouth!
Once again, I've been reminded@that deliciousness and happiness...@is what this kind of food is all about.@There is heaven in my mouth, and@I can only describe it as delicious!

group_1.textCenter: It's even better than before!@It's really delicious...!

group_1.textRight: ...I'll give you some of mine,@and you can have some of this, too.

group_1.textLeft: Really?!@[chara:302401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302401:cheek_1][chara:302401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302401:lipSynch_1]Wooow, I love you Ria-senpai!

group_1.textRight: ...You eat in such a way that it@makes me happy to watch you.
It's dripping with praise as usual...@But it's become a decent review.

group_1.textLeft: I know! I worked so hard on it...!
Can you lift the ban on Walnut's reviews now?@Please...!
Okay, I want to fill this restaurant@with customers.
I'll show you my power!

group_1.textRight: ...You really don't need to be so tense.
I don't mind if you just come to eat normally...

group_1.textLeft: No, I'll do my best!@Okay, bye!

group_1.textRight: Don't you seem less annoyed by her than before?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?@Really?
